00090 
00091     virtual void setEngine(BaseEngine* p)
00092     {
00093         AffxString str;
00094         m_pEngine = p;
00095         for (unsigned int i = 0; (i < m_vCNState.size()); i++)
00096         {
00097             if (i > 0) {str += ",";}
00098             str += ::getInt(m_vCNState[i]);
00099         }
00100         p->setOpt("hmmCN_state", str);
00101         str = "";
00102         for (unsigned int i = 0; (i < m_Mu.size()); i++)
00103         {
00104             if (i > 0) {str += ",";}
00105             str += ::getDouble(m_Mu[i], 6);
00106         }
00107         p->setOpt("hmmCN_mu",  str);
00108 
00109         // Set yTarget if m_Mu_Y has the second element
00110         if (m_Mu_Y.size() > 1) {m_pEngine->setOpt("yTarget", ToStr(m_Mu_Y[1]));}
00111     }
00112 
00113     virtual void run();
00114     virtual bool isSegmentTypeAnalysis() { return false; }
